function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased feelings of loneliness among younger age groups during the COVID-19 pandemic leading to symptoms of anxiety and depression.","Impact":"Heightened risk of mental health issues in younger age groups, impacting overall well-being and ability to cope with the pandemic.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted support programs and interventions to address loneliness and mental health concerns in younger age groups.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, digital mental health platforms, remote counseling services.","People":"Younger age groups","Owner":"Healthcare professionals, mental health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Adverse psychological outcomes associated with home confinement and social distancing during the pandemic, including emotional disorders, depression, anxiety, stress, irritability, insomnia, PTSD, anger, emotional exhaustion, risky behaviors, and increased substance abuse.","Impact":"Increased risk of a wide range of psychological symptoms and behaviors, impacting individual and public mental health.","Mitigation":"Provide mental health resources, online support groups, and virtual therapy to address and alleviate psychological symptoms and risky behaviors.","Technologies":"Telehealth, virtual therapy platforms, mental health apps.","People":"General population, particularly those in home confinement and practicing social distancing","Owner":"Mental health professionals, community organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Need to pay attention to and strengthen the public's mental health to minimize the consequences of loneliness and social isolation due to COVID-19.","Impact":"Potential long-term mental health consequences for the global population, stemming from loneliness and social isolation during the pandemic.","Mitigation":"Develop and implement mental health support programs, community outreach initiatives, and public awareness campaigns to address and alleviate loneliness and social isolation.","Technologies":"Telepsychiatry, virtual support groups, online mental health education.","People":"Global population, especially those affected by loneliness and social isolation","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health organizations, public health agencies"}]}
